'''Traveler's Handy Sword''' is a 3-Star [[Sword]] obtainable from [[Chests]].

==Description==
A reliable and balanced sword made of fine steel.<br />
The one downside is that the partial-tang design renders it less durable than its full-tang counterparts.<br />
That said, the partial tang creates space in the hilt for hidden knives, scissors, tinder, and other objects.<br />
Hence the name, Traveler's Handy Sword. It contains all sorts of handy items for travelers.
